text: Area code 941 is a telephone area code in the North American Numbering Plan. It covers the southwestern part of Florida, including cities like Sarasota, Bradenton, and Punta Gorda. Area code 941 was established on May 28, 1995 as a split from area code 813, being the fifth interchangeable area code after 334, 360, 520, and 970. 941
title: Area code 941
